name: Frost Ring
effect:
:activation: Select a space on the Combat board. 2 [units](../units/index.md) adjacent to this space suffer:

:empower: 0 ➣ 1 :damage:
:empower: 2 ➣ 2 :damage:
:empower: 4 ➣ 3 :damage:

— OR —

:instant: +1 :empower:
notes: The :damage: from Frost Ring also applies to friendly units.
